ing: water, or as needed to cover
1/3 cup white sugar, or more to taste
8 ears corn on the cob, husks and silk removed
n: Daddy K's Milk Boiled Corn on the Cob
des: "Absolutely sweet and tender corn on the cob! Serve with salt, black pepper, and butter."
ins: Bring water to a boil in a large stock pot; stir in milk, sugar, cream, and butter until sugar dissolves and butter melts. Gently place ears of corn into the mixture and reduce heat to low. Simmer corn until tender, 7 to 8 minutes. Remove from the liquid with tongs and set aside under aluminum foil until serving time.
